```{r setup}
library(alohaal)
library(tidyverse)
anoles <- ggplot(data = lef_anole, aes(x=HEIGHT, y = Tail)) + geom_point(aes(color = SEASON, shape = SEASON), alpha = 0.8) + labs(title = "Height and Tail Length of Anoles By Season of Data Collection") + xlim(0,25)
```
